Text: Yeah - this program protects your computer all right - by locking you off the internet.  Anti-Spam Anti-Spam is Good  antispam function[2] The latest of Internet Security has antispam function that is helpful because I has received a mountain of those these days.  Other than that it is all the same except the new updates.  Symantec softwares [+2]  But that is good for me because Symantec softwares are a bit hard to master for me who are not savvy on computers.  So far I haven't had so much complaints except that I still haven't mastered how to scandisk when using Internet Security.
